getInputStream().Description: Returns an input stream which can read data from the remote node. The stream should be closed when no longer needed. This method will only return null if this result's The returned stream will throw @B_java#io#IOException_E@ on read if any connection errors occur. This exception might be a @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#ChannelIOException_E@. Since data for this stream comes over the network, reads may block for a long time. Multiple calls to this method will return the same instance.
